summary.overall_verdict: Functionally complete; requires security hardening and consistency fixes

issues.title: Double CQRS handler registration (YAML tags + PHP attribute)
issues.description: 94 of 127 handlers have bare #[AsMessageHandler] without bus: parameter, plus YAML tag for specific bus. Causes dual registration on default bus and target bus.
issues.impact: Commands may be processed twice, causing double writes
issues.fix: Add explicit bus: parameter to all #[AsMessageHandler] attributes, or remove YAML tags

issues.title: Hand-rolled JWT implementation
issues.description: Custom JWT via manual base64, hash_hmac. No jti, nbf claims. HS256 only.
issues.impact: Token forgery possible if secret leaks. No individual token revocation.
issues.fix: Replace with firebase/php-jwt or lexik/jwt-authentication-bundle. Add RS256, jti, nbf.

issues.title: Placeholder secrets in .env
issues.description: .env contains APP_SECRET=change_me_secret, API_SECRET=change_me_api, JWT_SECRET=change_me_jwt
issues.impact: Production with default secrets = full security breach
issues.fix: Add startup validation rejecting known placeholders. Use env vars or vault.

issues.title: Missing indexes on Loan entity
issues.description: Loan entity (one of most queried tables) has ZERO indexes on user_id, book_id, due_at, returned_at
issues.impact: Full table scans on every loan query. Performance degradation.
issues.fix: Add ORM\Index on user_id, book_id, due_at, returned_at

issues.title: Missing indexes on Reservation entity
issues.description: Reservation entity has zero indexes. user_id, book_id, status, expires_at all heavily queried.
issues.impact: Full table scans. Performance degradation.
issues.fix: Add composite indexes on [user_id, status], [book_id, status], [expires_at]

issues.title: Rating/Review entity duplication
issues.description: Rating has $review text field AND separate Review entity. Both have user_id+book_id unique constraints.
issues.impact: Data inconsistency — reviews can exist in two places
issues.fix: Merge into single entity or remove $review from Rating

issues.title: No ErrorBoundary in React app
issues.description: Zero ErrorBoundary implementations. Unhandled JS error = white screen crash.
issues.impact: Entire app unusable on any uncaught error
issues.fix: Add ErrorBoundary wrapping <App/> and granular boundaries around pages

issues.title: Dual API layer (legacy + new)
issues.description: src/api.js (legacy, used everywhere) and src/api/client.js (new, with interceptors/retry/refresh) coexist. New client largely unused.
issues.impact: Retry logic, token refresh, request tracing are dead code
issues.fix: Delete legacy api.js. Migrate all imports to api/client.js.

issues.title: Auth state in two competing systems
issues.description: AuthContext.jsx (used everywhere) and authStore.js (Zustand, unused) manage auth independently.
issues.impact: Confusing architecture, redundant localStorage writes
issues.fix: Pick one (prefer Zustand). Delete unused one.

issues.title: Python microservices have zero tests
issues.description: notification-service/ and recommendation-service/ have no tests at all.
issues.impact: Services can break silently without detection
issues.fix: Add pytest for both services. Add to CI pipeline.

issues.title: CORS wildcard override on /api/
issues.description: nelmio_cors.yaml: paths '^/api/': allow_origin: ['*'] overrides CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN env var
issues.impact: Any website can make cross-origin requests to API
issues.fix: Remove wildcard path override. Use CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN env var.

issues.title: Registration rate limiting disabled
issues.description: Rate limiter is commented out in RegistrationController.php
issues.impact: Unlimited account creation possible
issues.fix: Uncomment and enable rate limiter

issues.title: Test auth endpoint accessible in non-production
issues.description: TestAuthController and public/test-auth.php expose JWT debug info
issues.impact: Information leakage of config, file paths, stack traces
issues.fix: Remove from production builds. Add to .dockerignore.

issues.title: API secret grants full admin access
issues.description: Anyone with API_SECRET header value gets ROLE_ADMIN + ROLE_SYSTEM without audit trail
issues.impact: Full admin access with placeholder secret
issues.fix: Scope API secret to specific endpoints. Implement proper service-to-service auth.

issues.title: DateTimeInterface instead of DateTimeImmutable
issues.description: Loan has 4 datetime properties typed as DateTimeInterface. Book.createdAt also. Allows mutable DateTime injection.
issues.impact: Immutability guarantees broken
issues.fix: Change to DateTimeImmutable

issues.title: Missing indexes on 8 entities
issues.description: Fine, BookCopy, NotificationLog, WeedingRecord, AcquisitionOrder, User, Rating, IntegrationConfig missing indexes
issues.impact: Slow queries on frequently filtered columns
issues.fix: Add ORM\Index annotations

issues.title: SoftDeletableTrait unused
issues.description: SoftDeletableTrait exists but no entity imports it. Dead code.
issues.impact: Confusing codebase. No soft delete capability despite trait existing.
issues.fix: Apply to entities needing soft delete or remove trait

issues.title: No code splitting / lazy loading
issues.description: All 14+ page components eagerly imported. Admin/librarian pages downloaded by all users.
issues.impact: Larger initial bundle, slower first load
issues.fix: Use React.lazy() + Suspense for route-level code splitting

issues.title: Most routes unprotected
issues.description: /loans, /reservations, /favorites, /notifications, /dashboard have no auth guard
issues.impact: Unauthenticated users navigate to protected pages, triggering API errors
issues.fix: Wrap with AuthGuard

issues.title: No 404 catch-all route
issues.description: Missing Route path='*'. Invalid URLs show empty page.
issues.impact: Poor UX for mistyped URLs
issues.fix: Add <Route path='*' element={<NotFound />} />

issues.title: No cross-service integration tests
issues.description: No tests verify contracts between PHP backend, notification-service, and recommendation-service
issues.impact: Broken contracts between services go undetected
issues.fix: Add Docker Compose-based integration tests in CI

issues.title: Two namespaces for query handlers
issues.description: Handler\Query\ (45 files) and QueryHandler\ (6 files) coexist
issues.impact: Confusing structure for developers
issues.fix: Move QueryHandler\ contents into Handler\Query\

issues.title: Missing Messenger routing for 6 classes
issues.description: UpdateLoanCommand, PrepareReservationCommand, ExportBooksQuery, FindSimilarBooksQuery, GetLibraryStatisticsQuery, GetUserByIdQuery missing from messenger.yaml routing
issues.impact: Dispatches go to default bus instead of target bus
issues.fix: Add routing entries to messenger.yaml

issues.title: Handler in wrong namespace
issues.description: PrepareReservationCommandHandler is in Application\Command\Reservation\ instead of Handler\Command\
issues.impact: Not covered by YAML tag, falls to default bus
issues.fix: Move to Handler\Command\Reservation\

issues.title: Functional duplication (dashboard, export)
issues.description: DashboardOverviewHandler + GetOverviewQueryHandler, ExportCatalogHandler + ExportBooksQueryHandler handle overlapping functionality
issues.impact: Confusion about which handler to use
issues.fix: Merge or remove duplicates

issues.title: Password hashing bypasses Symfony hasher
issues.description: Code uses native password_hash/password_verify instead of UserPasswordHasherInterface
issues.impact: Symfony's algorithm upgrade path and cost configuration ignored
issues.fix: Inject and use UserPasswordHasherInterface

issues.title: Inconsistent password strength policies
issues.description: DTO requires 10 chars, service requires 8 chars, change password handler has commented-out validation
issues.impact: Confusing and potentially exploitable
issues.fix: Centralize password policy

issues.title: 24h access token lifetime
issues.description: TTL = 86400 (24h) with no jti blacklist
issues.impact: Stolen access token valid for 24 hours
issues.fix: Reduce to 15-30 minutes. Refresh mechanism already exists.

issues.title: Excessive debug logging in auth code
issues.description: 16+ error_log() calls in JwtAuthenticator logging token presence, user IDs, auth header length
issues.impact: Information disclosure in production logs
issues.fix: Remove error_log(). Use structured logger with appropriate levels.

issues.title: User PIN stored as plaintext
issues.description: User.$pin stored as VARCHAR(4) without hashing
issues.impact: PIN leak from database compromise
issues.fix: Hash PIN like password, or remove

issues.title: PESEL stored without encryption (GDPR)
issues.description: User.pesel (Polish national ID) stored as plaintext
issues.impact: GDPR non-compliance risk
issues.fix: Encrypt at rest or pseudonymize

issues.title: Refresh token doesn't check user status
issues.description: Refresh endpoint doesn't verify blocked/verified status before issuing new access token
issues.impact: Blocked user can keep refreshing tokens
issues.fix: Add user status checks in refresh flow

issues.title: No updatedAt on Book and Loan
issues.description: Book and Loan entities have no updatedAt field or lifecycle callbacks
issues.impact: No way to track when records were last modified
issues.fix: Add updatedAt with HasLifecycleCallbacks

issues.title: 8 entities without explicit ORM\Table
issues.description: Book, Loan, Reservation, Fine, BookCopy, WeedingRecord, AcquisitionOrder, AcquisitionBudget missing explicit table name
issues.impact: Auto-generated names may conflict with reserved words in some DBs
issues.fix: Add #[ORM\Table(name: '...')] to all entities

issues.title: AcquisitionBudget.adjustSpentBy() sign bug
issues.description: Sign handling double-negates negatives because normalizeMoney uses abs()
issues.impact: Negative adjustments produce positive changes
issues.fix: Fix sign logic in adjustSpentBy method

issues.title: AuditLog values stored as text instead of json
issues.description: oldValues and newValues are type text but contain JSON
issues.impact: No proper serialization/deserialization by Doctrine
issues.fix: Change to type: 'json'

issues.title: console.log leaks JWT token prefix
issues.description: Legacy api.js has console.log calls that leak partial JWT tokens
issues.impact: Token fragment visible in browser devtools
issues.fix: Remove debug console.log or gate behind development check

issues.title: window.location bypasses React Router
issues.description: Hard window.location.href causes full page reload, destroying React state
issues.impact: Poor UX, state loss
issues.fix: Use useNavigate() from react-router-dom

issues.title: No TypeScript in frontend
issues.description: 100% JavaScript. No type safety, weaker IDE support.
issues.impact: Refactoring risk, harder onboarding
issues.fix: Add tsconfig with allowJs, migrate incrementally

issues.title: ResourceCacheContext duplicates Zustand cacheStore
issues.description: Same pattern as auth — Context-based cache is used, Zustand store is orphaned
issues.impact: Confusing architecture
issues.fix: Pick one, delete unused

issues.title: PHPUnit config missing 5 test suites
issues.description: Integration, Service, Entity, EventSubscriber, Performance suites not registered in phpunit.xml.dist
issues.impact: Tests exist but won't run via --testsuite filtering
issues.fix: Add testsuite entries to phpunit.xml.dist

issues.title: PHPStan level mismatch (CI=5, local=6)
issues.description: CI runs --level=5, phpstan.neon defines level: 6
issues.impact: CI is less strict than expected
issues.fix: Change CI to --level=6

issues.title: PHP-CS-Fixer with continue-on-error
issues.description: CI step uses continue-on-error: true — style violations don't block merges
issues.impact: Code style not enforced
issues.fix: Remove continue-on-error: true

issues.title: Duplicate rate limiter configuration
issues.description: login_attempts defined in both framework.yaml and rate_limiter.yaml with different policies
issues.impact: Unpredictable rate limiting behavior
issues.fix: Consolidate to one file

issues.title: APP_ENV: prod in dev docker-compose
issues.description: Both docker-compose.yml and distributed.yml set APP_ENV: prod for development
issues.impact: No Symfony debug toolbar, poor error messages in dev
issues.fix: Set APP_ENV: dev in development compose files

issues.title: No PHP backend Prometheus metrics
issues.description: Prometheus scrapes Traefik, notification-service, recommendation-service, RabbitMQ — but NOT the PHP backend
issues.impact: No PHP application-level metrics
issues.fix: Add promphp/prometheus_client_php or artprima/prometheus-metrics-bundle

issues.title: Dockerfiles without HEALTHCHECK
issues.description: No Dockerfile contains HEALTHCHECK instruction
issues.impact: Container orchestrators can't auto-heal
issues.fix: Add HEALTHCHECK CMD to Dockerfiles

catalog_search.coverage: Book/Author/Category CRUD, ISBN, search, filters, collections, availability, copies

loans.coverage: Create/return/extend, history, overdue detection, due reminders

fines.coverage: Auto-assess overdue, manual create, pay, cancel

users.coverage: Registration, JWT auth, profiles, roles, blocking, cards, permissions

notifications.coverage: Email + in-app, due/overdue/reservation events, preferences, newsletter

recommendations.coverage: Ratings, reviews, OpenAI embeddings, pgvector similarity, feedback

reports_statistics.coverage: Usage, popular, financial, patron, inventory, dashboard, export

administration.coverage: Settings, roles, integrations, audit logs, announcements, weeding, backups

acquisition.coverage: Orders, suppliers, budgets, expenses, status tracking
